sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; const About = ()=>{ return (
About
Mission

To be a recognized brand nationally, and even among the world's best brands.

Who are we?

Vestir is Bulacan's best local brand of clothing. Vestir offers high quality products that is on par with most premium brand's quality. We at Vestir, aims to provide our customers with the highest quality of fashionable clothing in terms of aesthetics and durability.

Vision

To inspire, provide, and create a new level of fashion for men and women.

) } export default About
